attributes.action: Stop the change of ownership of the Northycote Farm Tearooms
attributes.additional_details:
This Tearooms has seen a steady rise in trade since the current management took over the running of the Tearooms in May 2006, and has become a staple attraction in the local area ever since, providing families and those looking to find some peace and tranquility in the local natural surroundings with a place to enjoy a rest, a relaxing warm drink, or a well deserved bite to eat after an adventure in the local surrounding farm and woodland.
The proposal is set to result in the part demolition and refurbishment of a section of the
attributes.background: The local Wolverhampton City Council is proposing a change of ownership of the Tearooms located at Northycote Farm.

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 


https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
